about_the_game:
Sanctity is a Hack & Slash RPG with platformer elements where you travel between the Real and Virtual Worlds in fast-paced combat against swarms of enemies and boss fights inspired by MMO raid design.



Enter the world of Sanctaidd, an Arcanepunk city lost to a strange Corruption that is driving the citizens into fits of insanity and rage.

Take up your sword and prepare yourself to Wall-Run and Gravity Hook your way through Gothic Cyberpunk city as you hack and slash your way through waves of enemies, ranging from crazed citizens and malfunctioning mechs to colossal beasts and magic-wielding foes.

Challenge yourself with side-content Challenge Runs where you race to beat the clock and other players to get the best time for each challenge level!

Experience an unnerving and emotional story that mixes dark fantasy and cyberpunk themes as you take control of Aldreda, an arcane-powered android built to protect humanity against both the Corruption and Fae-kind.



For as long as the history books recorded, humans and Fae had been sworn enemies. Driven by insatiable greed, humans hungered for ever-expanding territories and resources whilst the ethereal Fae, with an aura of otherworldly superiority, regarded themselves far above mere mortals.

Naturally, this led to war - one that lasted for generations, both sides locked in a stalemate.

Then, one day, the king of the humans was visited by a “god”, who gave them a gift to turn the tides of war - the gift of “technology”.

With their new technology, the humans decemated the Fae forces, subjugating them and building a world in God's name by deploying autonomous knights known as Paladins - one for each of the 7 elements; Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Light, Dark and Gravity. . Now at peace through technology, humans succumbed to stagnation.

They built their grand fortress cities, enslaved the Fae to do their bidding, and wollowed away their lives in debauchery and frivolity within God's Infinite Paradise system.

Thus has the world remained for centuries, stuck in an ever lasting cycle of stagnation. That was, until the Corrupted came.

Swiftly consuming the world, the Paladins struggling valiantly against the blasphemy of the Corrupted. But even the might of the Paladins could not stop the spread from reaching the Holy City…

With her trusted Artificial Companion, Aura, the Paladin of Gravity known as Aldreda returns to find a city in chaos. Armed with only her wits, combat prowess and sword, can she fight back against the wave of Corruption and save the remaining citizens of Sanctaidd?



  • Fast-paced Hack & Slash action reminiscent classic Character Action Games
  • Boss battles inspired by MMO raid design
  • Build Aldreda as you want her, through both stat builds and equipment builds
  • Discover the truth behind the Corruption spreading through the city of Sanctaidd, and the untold history of the world Sanctity
  • A hypnotic soundtrack composed by Between The Rains Music and Hiroki Kikuta (composer of Secret of Mana)
  • Test your skills in Time Trial side-content, and see if you can top the leaderboards!

content_descriptors.notes: Sanctity contains fantasy violence through it's combat, and deals with topics including depression and separation anxiety.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1300X; Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 270X; NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
